body_html:
@wwxFromTju Have you followed the instructions here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x

Note the following section:

If you want to compile tensorflow and have the XCode 7.3 installed, note that Xcode 7.3 is not yet compatible with CUDA 7.5. You will need to download Xcode 7.2 and select it as your default:

$ sudo xcode-select -s /Application/Xcode-7.2/Xcode.app

I am not an expert on the mac environment, but perhaps you can try XCode 7.2?

$ sudo xcode-select -s /Application/Xcode-7.2/Xcode.app

body:
@wwxFromTju Have you followed the instructions here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x

Note the following section:

---

If you want to compile tensorflow and have the XCode 7.3 installed, note that Xcode 7.3 is not yet compatible with CUDA 7.5. You will need to download Xcode 7.2 and select it as your default:

```
$ sudo xcode-select -s /Application/Xcode-7.2/Xcode.app
```

---

I am not an expert on the mac environment, but perhaps you can try XCode 7.2?
